channel.title: Windows Subsystem for Linux :: CIS 527 Textbook
channel.description: YouTube Video Resources Windows 10 WSL Installation Guide from Microsoft Windows Subsystem for Linux Documentation from Microsoft Video Transcript In this video, I will briefly introduce the Windows Subsystem for Linux, or WSL, which was one of the most highly anticipated features added to Windows 10 in the last couple of years. WSL allows you to install a full Linux distribution right inside your Windows 10 OS, giving you terminal access to some of your favorite Linux programs and tools.
